"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d801e63687236a4241400#post_552d801e63687236a4241400
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d7ee863687237ac9c0f00#post_552d7ee863687237ac9c0f00
It's not gonna be Nichijou. If ANYONE dubs Nichijou it'll probably be Sentai Filmworks given they have localized almost all Kyoani anime. With the exception of Free!.[/bq]
I'm just guessing FUNimation because of a copyright claim by "FUNimation" taking down Nichijou episodes, I haven't seen any evidence to suggest anyone else would have acquired the rights

But I guess Sentai could be the second most likely, if not the first

...Dammit, someone ELSE to keep an eye on now

"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d8cd26368723781bb1800#post_552d8cd26368723781bb1800
[bq="Gizoid101"]@EVERYONE IS WATCHING WOLF CHILDREN AND CRYING IN AN ORGY OF FEELS AND TEARS@

*@I AM JUST SITTING HERE, WATCHING THE DARK AND GRUESOME NARUTARU@*[/bq]
And I'm just sitting here, doing the same old thing I've been doing for a while now

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552d98826368722d988c0700#post_552d98826368722d988c0700
The pinkie voice is so good for a khajiit! It has the nonspecific foreign accent, references self in the third person and has a weird verbal tic, yaes. 

Also tangentially another thing I love about khajiit is that they're a born thief race. A khajiit born in elswyr that has never stolen anything would probably be pretty uncommon. The word for "laws" in their language literally translates to something along the lines of "stupid arbitrary rules"

topics.body:
I had a interesting thought; maybe the economic stagnation currently on the worldwide market is it's natural state?

What I mean by this is that a massive thing that has changed since when the recession happened and the housing crashed happened was that computers are more and more in control of the stock market not humans.  The housing boom was artificial growth not natural economic growth.  When you get down to it economic booms that are followed by economic busts are due to artificial growth because of humans.  Well what happens if you increasingly remove humans from the economic decision making process?  To put it bluntly is the reason why we're not in a economic boom is because the computers in charge of wall street don't think like humans and therefore aren't creating artificial growth?  Is the worldwide economic stagnation right now due to because we're removing humans from the stock market and thus not generating artificial economic growth and that in reality the worldwide economic stagnation is due to actual economies and such?

Tl:dr; To use an analogy think of the world's economy as a Speed drug addict; they reached the point where they can't function without it but the second they no longer get that high they crash hard.  The difference now is that they're kicking the drug addiction and now their actual performance while it's not as high as when they were high is their natural performance levels.
